info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 4 at 3:43AM CDT until July 4 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of west central Wisconsin, including the following county, Jackson.
* WHEN...Until 600 AM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 340 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing. Between 1 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Flooding impacts will continue, but only light additional rainfall is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Black River Falls, York, Northfield, Alma Center, Levis, Taylor, Hixton, North Branch, Hixton Alma Center K O A, Disco, Perry Creek Recreation Area, Castle Mound, Vaudreuil, The Majestic Pines Casino and Requa. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING
